snippet: Mali, which was just coming to the end of 21-day quarantines for 108 people linked to its first Ebola case, now has a second, the government announced Tuesday.
abstract: Officials in Mali announce emergence of second Ebola case; new threat comes as nation approaches end of 21-day quarantines for 108 people linked to first, fatal case.
lead_paragraph: Mali, which was just coming to the end of 21-day quarantines for 108 people linked to its first Ebola case, now has a second, the government announced Tuesday.

headline.main: Mali: New Ebola Case Is Confirmed as Response to First Was Wrapping Up
headline.print_headline: Mali: New Ebola Case Is Confirmed as Response to First Was Wrapping Up
